With that said, you can use the below link to see all the tasks pending/open for you and work on them. https://verisk.service-now.com/task_list.do?sysparm_query=assigned_to%3Djavascript%3AgetMyAssignments()%5EstateNOT%20IN6%5Estate!%3D3%5EORstate%3DNULL%5Estate!%3D4%5EORstate%3DNULL

From: Vora, Hardik Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2017 10:34 AM To: Joshi, Piyush <PJoshi@veriskhealth.com> Cc: Spitzer, Ian <ISpitzer@verisk.com> Subject: Re: My work in Service now.
Hi Piyush,
From the history it shows that this task was closed and reopened. Once a Catalog Task is closed, it's no longer active since the workflow associated with the parent requested item (RITMxxxxx) has already moved forward. The "My Work" query will only show Active Task assigned to you. That is why this task no longer appears in your list. Thanks.
